main event: Several military observers at Amarillo AFB reported seeing a thin, silver object that appeared to climb and descend like a jet aircraft on 11 Jul 58.
interesting points: The object was described as wavy and wobbling during its climb,The object climbed above a B-36 bomber at 22,000 feet before disappearing from sight,Multiple radar operators confirmed the sighting, The object was not identified as a B-36 and was deemed probably astronomical,There is insufficient data for further evaluation of the sighting.
